abstract: Community leaders in Paterson, NJ, meet with neighborhood representatives in attempt to bring city's rival gangs together after April shooting death of 15-year-old basketball star Armoni Sexton; heroin sales are up at time when budget cuts have greatly diminished police presence; city has had six homicides to date in 2015, compared with 24 in 2014.
lead_paragraph: After Armoni Sexton, 15, was fatally shot in Paterson, N.J., community leaders met with representatives of neighborhoods with a decades-old quarrel and told them: Let’s end this.

headline.main: Too Late for a Basketball Prodigy, Paterson Seeks a Truce
headline.print_headline: Too Late for Gifted Athlete, Paterson Seeks Truce

snippet: After Armoni Sexton, 15, was fatally shot in Paterson, N.J., community leaders met with representatives of neighborhoods with a decades-old quarrel and told them: Let’s end this.
